statements: SELECT * FROM ad_copy_variations;
SELECT ad_copy FROM ad_copy_variations;
SELECT ad_copy, test_results FROM ad_copy_variations;
SELECT id, ad_copy, test_results FROM ad_copy_variations;
SELECT * FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, ad_copy FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT ad_copy, test_results->'clicks' AS clicks FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE id = 3 AND test_results->'clicks' > 100;
SELECT id, ad_copy FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, ad_copy, jsonb_typeof(test_results) AS test_results_type FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE test_results @> '{"conversions": 5}' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_copy_testing_results;
SELECT id, ad_copy_id, variation_id, test_result FROM ad_copy_testing_results ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT variation_text FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE ad_copy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, variation_text FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM ad_copy_testing_results WHERE id = 1
SELECT variation_text FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE ad_copy_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, ad_copy_id, JSONB_OBJECT_KEYS(test_result) AS key FROM ad_copy_testing_results WHERE variation_id = 3
SELECT * FROM ad_copy_variations ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_copy_id, COUNT(*) AS total_variations FROM ad_copy_variations GROUP BY ad_copy_id HAVING total_variations > 1
SELECT * FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE ad_id = 1 LIMIT 1
SELECT ad_text, ad_variation FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY ad_variation DESC
SELECT ad_text, clicks FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE conversions >= 10 ORDER BY clicks ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT COUNT(reference_id), reference_type FROM reference_data GROUP BY reference_type HAVING COUNT(reference_id) > 1
SELECT ad_id, ad_text FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE ad_variation = 'Variant A'
SELECT * FROM reference_data ORDER BY reference_type DESC, reference_id ASC
SELECT ad_id, ad_variation, clicks, conversions FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions < 10
SELECT test_id, test_date, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY test_id DESC
SELECT ad_text, ad_variation, reference_type, reference_value FROM ad_copy_variations INNER JOIN reference_data ON ad_copy_variations.ad_id = reference_data.ad_id
SELECT ad_id, ad_copy, ad_description, test_results FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE ad_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM ad_copy_variations ORDER BY ad_id ASC;
SELECT ad_copy, test_results FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE ad_description LIKE '%best-selling%';
SELECT * FROM test_results_data WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY test_date DESC, result_id ASC;
SELECT ad_id, test_result FROM successful_tests WHERE test_result ->> 'status' = 'successful';
SELECT * FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE ad_id = 100;
SELECT ad_description, ad_copy FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE ad_description LIKE '%promotional%';
SELECT ad_id, ad_description FROM ad_copy_variations ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_description, test_results FROM ad_copy_variations WHERE test_results->>'success' = 'true';
SELECT ad_id, ad_copy, test_results FROM ad_copy_variations LEFT JOIN test_results_data ON ad_copy_variations.ad_id = test_results_data.ad_id;
SELECT ad_id, ad_text, ad_status FROM ad_variants
SELECT ad_text, ad_status, ad_id FROM ad_variants
SELECT * FROM ad_variants
SELECT ad_text FROM ad_variants
SELECT ad_status, ad_id FROM ad_variants
SELECT * FROM ad_variants WHERE ad_status = 'active';
SELECT ad_text FROM ad_variants WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, ad_status FROM ad_variants WHERE ad_status = 'inactive';
SELECT ad_text FROM ad_variants WHERE ad_status = 'active' ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_text, ad_status FROM ad_variants WHERE ad_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
